main event: A brilliant object traveling at a terrific speed, the size of the full moon but smaller, was observed in Ilha Itamaraca, Brazil, disappearing behind a large cloud which then flared. The report suggests it was likely a meteor.
interesting points: The object was reported to have flared up for a moment, possibly when passing small clouds.
The sighting was made by the third mate on duty of the M/S Cometa enroute from Norway, with a clear description of the object's appearance and trajectory.
The object was visible for approximately 5 seconds, and the ship did not send any direct report to the American authorities at the time.
The report was sent via commercial telegram and suggested that the interested authorities in the US should be notified.
The US authorities were informed via a communication relayed from the ship's commercial telegram, indicating international coordination regarding the UFO report.
sighted object: a brilliant object traveling at a terrific speed
witnesses: the third mate on duty of the M/S Cometa
photographs: no, the report does not include photographs
